allah me siyalu deya sathyaorthayak lesin misa nirmanaya nokaleyaga danumathi janathawata ohu mese sangnya heli karayi. 10-6 shuddha wu kuraanaya niyathawashayenma diwa rathriya maruwimehida ahaswala saha mahapolowehi allah nirmanaya kala dawalada (sathyayen bahara wimen walaki sitina) biyabathimath janayawa (aayath) sangnya atha. 10-7 shuddha wu kuraanaya niyathawashayenma apa hamuwima apeksha nokarana, thawada melowa jiwithaya gana sominas wi ehi pina gos, thawada apage aayath gana thakimak nokarana ayada. 10-8 shuddha wu kuraanaya owun upayagath da (sados aagama saha waradi hasirima) nisa owunge (awasana) wasasthanaya niraya we. 10-9 shuddha wu kuraanaya niyathawashayenma wishwasa kara yahakam kala ayata owun wishwasa kala nisa owunge rab (paramadhipathi) owunata yahamaga penwanneya.
